RODRIGO MORÁN
  • ABOUT
  • CONTACT

Rodrigo Morán (Valladolid, 1992) is an emerging artist holding a BA in fine arts by Universidad Politecnica de Valencia, Spain.

Both his attentive eye and creative ambition have led him to experiment with different forms of artistic creation including photography, sculpture, video, and installation. Currently he is developing different projects through which he aims to build new pathways of creation as well as provide a fresh vision of the social issues of the modern-day. He finds inspiration in nature and organic processes, light and perception.

«My work is born of a personal observation that, taken into action, seeks to present new prisms to view our surroundings both individual and external. Drawing attention to the way we perceive and interact with our environment is a key factor in my artistic processes.»

Technically, the use of a wide range of creative resources is a signature feature of his work, taking special importance the instalative projects, video and the exploration of new technologies in the artistic creation.
